prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a spiky appearance and a vibrant color palette.
I want a Pokemon with a jellyfish-like body and bright purple and blue colors.
Generate a sea creature Pokemon with tentacles and a unique blend of colors.
Make a cute aquatic Pokemon that looks both dangerous and adorable at the same time.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in the ocean with spiky features and a bright color scheme.
Design a Pokemon that has a mysterious aura and is found in deep waters.
Give me a Pokemon with a round body and playful personality traits.
